title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti in salted water.
Whisk the eggs with pecorino and parmesan.
Drain the pasta and mix with the pancetta and egg mixture.
Serve with extra cheese and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken in yogurt and spices.
Grill the chicken until cooked through.
Fry onions, garlic, and spices in butter.
Add tomato paste and cook until thick.
Stir in the cream and simmer.
Serve the sauce with grilled chicken.
